g:HTMLPanel.p: This BPMN extension was developed as a part of a Bachelor-Thesis for the University in Reutlingen, Germany
It includes the BPMN-Framework, developed by bpmn.io, as BPMN-Editor and provides the configuration of some BPMN-Elements for the Camunda-BPM-Engine.
